item.title: Python Saves My Time
item.description: “repetitive task should be automated” - somebody,somewhere ðŸ˜Ž Its common philosophy in field of it to automate repetitive tasks, even if it take some time now to set-up it it will save lot of time in future. In this post I like to share kinda experience i had today while updating my machine and how python solved it easily. In my work machine I am running Manjaro Linux, which is a Rolling Release based on Archlinux.
